title: The Alphabet dragon
brief_description: Presents an animated review of the alphabet. A dragon appears to a peasant couple and grants them twenty-six wishes that must commence with each letter of the alphabet. Along the way they make some foolish choices and eventually end up as they had begun, but having learnt something about wealth and happiness along the way.
